All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Banner
    This class is used to generate a banner that will be displayed at the start of the application
    CollisionAvoidance
    Implementation of the collisionAvoidance interface
    CollisionStatus
    This object is used to give some status back after a collionAvoidance check Note: This object is used on sections
    ECollisonAvoidanceStaus
    This will define the status a collionAvoidance will have
    ICollisonAvoidance
    The interface for the collionAvoidance
    IHandableThread
    The interface that is need when creating a interruptible with a overrun handler else you cannot log into a file
    ILidarInterface
    This interface is used to communicate with the lidar sensor on a RPI
    ILidarSensor
    This is a interface to store the informations of a lidar sensor
    IManagementControl
    This interface is used to manage the whole application
    IMissHandler
    Interface for a MissHander
    INetworkInterface
    This interface is used to gain access to the network.interface
    InterruptibleCollisionAvoidance
    This is a Interruptible for the CollisionAvoidance-Thread
    InterruptibleLidarDataCollection
    This is a Interruptible for the LidarDataCollection-Thread
    InterruptibleReaderDB
    This is a Interruptible for the ReaderDB-Thread
    InterruptibleWriterDB
    This is a Interruptible for the WriterDB-Thread
    IOverrunHandler
    Interface to a OverrunHandler
    IQCollisonBuffer
    This is the interface for a queue used for passing objects between the lidarScanner and the collisionAvoidance
    IRedisDBInterface
    This is a Interface to interact with a redis-Database
    ISensorsInterface
    This interface is used to access the CPU temperature of the system
    IStopWatch
    This is the interface for a stopWatch
    ITopInterface
    This interface is used to get some system informations using TOP(Linux)
    LidarInterface
    Implementation of a ILidarInterface used to control a lidar-sensor on an RPI
    LidarSensor
    Implementation of an ILidarSensor used to store and handle data of a lidar-sensor
    Logging
    This is the logging class to log some information to the console and file
    Main
    This is the main class of the Vehicle
    ManagementControl
    This contrete class is used to control/manage the whole application
    Manager
    This RealtimeThread is used to control the application using ManagementControl
    MissCollisonAvoidance
    Concrete MissHandler for the collisionAvoidance
    MissLidarDataCollection
    Concrete MissHandler for the lidarDataCollection
    NetworkInterface  
    OverrunCollisonAvoidance
    Concrete OverrunHandler for the collionAvoidance
    OverrunLidarDataCollection
    Concrete OverrunHandler for the lidarDataCollection
    QCollisonBuffer  
    RedisDBInterface  
    SensorsInterface  
    StopWatch
    This is the implementation of a stopwatch
    TCollisionAvoidance
    This is a RealtimeThread used for checking periodically for a collision/objects
    TLidarDataCollection
    This RealtimeThread is used to read the values periodically form a lidar-Sensor
    TopInterface  
    TReaderDB
    This RealtimeThread is used to write some entries periodically into a database
    TWriterDB
    This RealtimeThread is used to read periodically from a database
